## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G15410](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G15410)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCNGC2, CNGC2, DND1</u>
- **Gene Name:** CYCLIC NUCLEOTIDE-GATED CHANNEL 2, CYCLIC NUCLEOTIDE GATED CHANNEL 2, DEFENSE NO DEATH 1
- **Description:**   Cyclic nucleotide-regulated ion channel family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G15410.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G15410.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT5G15410.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G15410.2)
## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS6523]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced hypersensitive response (HR) cell death in response to avirulent Pseudomonas syringae pathogens; exhibits gene-for-gene restriction of pathogen growth in the absence of extensive HR cell death; constitutive systemic acquired resistance phenotype; constitutively elevated  levels of salicylic acid and defense.

   - [root](/tags/root/)
